subject: Information request
description_text:
Dear Sirs,

Could you please send me a diagram with the measurements of the base plate and where I can see the exact dimensions of the drilling? I am interested in a pedal set including the base plate to mount on my rig (Playseat Challenge X) and I want to verify if the drilling is supported by your product.

Thank you very much,

Mario Pires

conversations.body_text: Hi Mario Pires,     We already have some customers using this mounting bracket, and it has been working normally for them.

Thank you for your reply, but the cockpit I'm referring to is the Challenge X, which has a different mount than the standard Playseat in the photo. My mount has the same holes used by some Logitech and Thrustmaster pedals.
I use the Thrustmaster T-LCM, applied directly with 4 screws. The spacing between the holes is: Horizontal = 235 mm : Vertical = 220 mm.

My question is whether your base includes these holes, or if not, if you can provide it with these additional holes.

Regards,
Mario Pires

________________________________
De: service@simsonn.com
Hi Mario Pires, Could you please send me a photo of the bracket? We’d like to check it, as we don’t currently have this bracket model.

Hi,
I have attached a diagram from the assembly manual with the necessary measurements (these correspond to the bases of some Logitech and Thrustmaster pedals - T-LCM).
